archimate:Node.name: [Data Backbone] Base Data Management and Transfer Nodes (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: These nodes perform routine integrity assessment, and manage file system meta-data held in external databases. These nodes perform the stagein, stage-out and NCSA-Base replication transfers as well as disk-to-tape hierarchy transfers and purge operations. There are sufficent nodes to serve devleopement and test purposes.
